message.name: ERR_FV_RULE_SET_EMPTY
message.locale: The rule set must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_RULE_SET_NAME_INVALID
message.locale: The Ruleset name entered is invalid. The valid characters are a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and _. Spaces are not allowed.

message.name: ERR_FV_FILTER_RULE_SET_NAME_INVALID
message.locale: The Filter Ruleset name entered is invalid. The valid characters are a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and _. Spaces are not allowed.

message.name: ERR_FV_CLASS_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: The concrete rule class extending '%1s' must be specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_FILTER_RULESET_EMPTY
message.locale: A Filter Ruleset Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_ELIGIBILITY_FILTER_SCRIPT_SAME
message.locale: The filter question script must have a different name to the question script.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CLASS_NOT_PRESENT_IN_RULE_SET
message.locale: The rule class '%1s' is not present in the rule set.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CLASS_DOES_NOT_EXTEND_ABSTRACT_SCREENING_RESULT
message.locale: The rule class '%1s' does not extend '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_NO_FILTER_RULE_SET_BUT_CLASS_NAME
message.locale: If no filter rule set is selected, no related rule set class name may be entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_NO_ELIGI_RULE_SET_BUT_CLASS_NAME
message.locale: If no eligibility rule set is selected, no related rule set class name may be entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_NO_FILTER_RULE_SET_CLASS_NAME
message.locale: You must specify a rule set class name in relation to the filter rule set.

message.name: ERR_XFV_NO_ELIGI_RULE_SET_CLASS_NAME
message.locale: You must specify a rule set class name in relation to the rule set.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CANNOT_DELETE_RULE_SET_HAS_ASSOCIATIONS
message.locale: This Rule Set has one or more associations to Screenings. You must remove these associations before deleting the Rule Set.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_RULE_SET_REUSE_IS_ENABLED
message.locale: This method must not be invoked when screening rule set reuse is enabled.

message.name: ERR_HAS_REFERENCE_TO_SCREENING_TYPE
message.locale: This ScreeningRulesLink cannot be removed as it is referenced by one or more ScreeningTypes.

message.name: ERR_XFV_RULE_SET_NOT_HAVE_CLASS_EXTENDING_SUPERCLASS
message.locale: The ruleset, '%1s', does not contain a class which extends the '%2s' ruleclass and therefore cannot be associated with an online screening.

message.name: ERR_XFV_RULE_SET_HAS_MULTIPLE_CLASS_EXTENDING_SUPERCLASS
message.locale: There are multiple rule classes extending '%1s'. Only one rule class should extend this rules class.
